comment: My friend Dr. Raphy Rosen is working on the front lines at New York Presbyterian Allen hospital. He wrote about his experience and what you can do to help. Please read every word. https://t.co/oBnI9hwP7Z

"There has been talk of how doctors may eventually need to make agonizing choices about how to triage who should receive life-sustaining treatment and who should not. Let me be clear: This is already happening."
@Yair_Rosenberg I wonder if this is because the initial messaging was it was really only a threat to older people?

Raphy is just in his 30s. He writes, "I am shocked by the number of patients that are younger and healthier than I am who are critically ill with coronavirus. I have never taken care of so many patients that remind me of me."
